ygData.subject: Re: Spoiler for Lambent Components delete if you do not want to read it!
ygData.msgSnippet: Crysarra, I know where to get regular rubies, but where do you get star rubies, and sapphires. And how much do they usually go for? Scanna Swiftsinger Level 31
ygData.messageBody:
Crysarra,
I know where to get regular rubies, but where do you get star rubies, and
sapphires. And how much do they usually go for?
Scanna Swiftsinger
Level 31 ( FINALLY!!!)
Bertox
-----Original Message-----
From: Crysarra de'Danaan <lucretia_71@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, November 12, 1999 7:01 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Spoiler for Lambent Components delete if you do not want
to read it!


>From: Crysarra de'Danaan <lucretia_71@...>
>
>Geez...sorry this may be a spoiler to some but i have them all and here
>they are:
>
>Lambent Breastplate: (Cyrissa) Basalt Carapace (from basalt gargoyles
>in lower guk), Gypsy Lute (from Mistmoore), Lambent Ruby;
>
>Lambent Helm: (Cyrissa) Opaline Helm (from Deepwater Goblins),
>Mudwater Rune (From Lizard Fanatic), Lambent Star Ruby;
>
>Lambent Vambraces: (Cyrissa) Fiery Vambraces (from Solusek Champion),
>The Top Portion of the Rune of the One Eye (Spawns on Choon), Lambent
>Sapphire;
>
>Lambent Bracers: (Cyrissa) Dark Boned Bracelet (From Greater Dark
>Boned Skeletons), Griffenne Charm (From Griffenne's), Lambent Fire
>Opal;
>
>Lambent Gauntlets: (Walthin) Shin Gauntlets (From Shin Knight in
>Guk), Black Silk Gloves (from Deathly Usher in Mistmoore), Lambent Star
>Ruby;
>
>Lambent Greaves: (Walthin) Icy Greaves: (Elite Goblin Guards in
>Permafrost), Shin Greaves (Shin Ghoul Knghts in Lower Guk), Lambent
>Fire Opal;
>
>GEMS:
>
>Lambent Boots: (Walthin) Firewalker Boots (From Solusek Mage), Middle
>Portion of the Rune of the One Eye (Froon), Lambent Sapphire.
>
>Lambent Fire Opal: 2 fire opals (purchase from Genni) and 1 Lambent
>stone. Give to Orstorm;
>
>Lambent Star Ruby: 2 Star Rubies and 1 Lambent Stone. Give to Genni;
>
>Lambent Sapphire: 2 Sapphires and 1 Lambent Stone. Give to Gardern;
>
>Lambent Ruby: 2 Rubies and 1 Lambent Stone. Give to Vilissia.
>
>
>--- Mike Roach <mroach@...> wrote:
>> This will make me seem lazy as hell, but I know someone out there has
>> the
>> exact requirements for all the lambent armor pieces and the exact
>> requirements for all the lambent gemstones and I am hoping that you
>> will
>> post this one more time for me as I seem to not be able to find this
>> info...especially for the gemstones. I just don't want to run all
>> the way
>> to the temple just to find out how many gold pieces I need to buy the
>> gem
>> components and all that.
>>
>> -Faras
>>
>>
>

with the subject lol.
